Information: Exports of agricultural equivalent products (mass of crops).

| Used to calculate :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` emissions from fertilizer application. 
 | 
 | Agriculture Fraction Dry and Agriculture Fraction Wet must sum to 1

| Used to calculate :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` emissions from organic soils. 
 | 
 | Agriculture Fraction Temperate and Agriculture Fraction Tropical must sum to 1

| Used to calculate :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` emissions from organic soils. 
 | 
 | Agriculture Fraction Temperate and Agriculture Fraction Tropical must sum to 1

| Used to calculate :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` emissions from fertilizer application
 | 
 | Agriculture Fraction Dry and Agriculture Fraction Wet must sum to 1
Elasticity of demand for crop in category ``$CAT-AGRICULTURE$`` to the changes in income, whose proxy is gdp/capita
Notes: See the `USDSA Commodity and Food Elasticities Database <https://www.ers.usda.gov/data-products/commodity-and-food-elasticities/>`_ for baseline elasticies by country.

Information: Proportion of the crop yield that is used for animal feed. Used to adjust demand for crops in response to changing animal populations. Demands for non-animal feed are driven by gdp/capita. Trivial proportions (e.g., radish tops) can be ignored.
Notes: Loose proportions dervied from `Statista <https://www.statista.com/statistics/1099196/brazil-corn-animal-feed/>`_ (quantity of Maize yield used for livestock feed), `FAO <https://www.fao.org/faostat/en/#data/QCL>`_ (total yield), and `VOX <https://www.vox.com/2014/8/21/6053187/cropland-map-food-fuel-animal-feed>`_ (conceptual importance).

Information: Yield (metric tons) per hectare of crops planted

| Fraction of total demand for crop products that is met by imports.
 | 
 | Conceptually, represented as the % of demand for total crop products that would be needed to produce all consumed crop products.

Proportion of total **crop** area (%/100), where crop area is calculated as the product of the country's area (``area_country_ha``) and the fraction of land use that is devoted to crop land (``frac_lu_cropland``)
Final total endogenous exports following adjustments to land use (reallocation and/or import/export loss)
Final total endogenous imports following adjustments to land use (reallocation and/or import/export loss)

Variable: Changes to Agriculture Net Imports Lost
Information:
| Use this value to quantify the opportunity cost of reducing crop production for export.
 | 
 | If specifying values of **Fraction of Changes to Net Exports Met** or **Fraction of Changes to Net Imports Met**  :math:`\not= 1` (see variables in the `Land Use <../afolu.html#land_use>_` subsector), then reductions in changes to net imports may incur economic costs.
Total area of each crop given in terms of the value specified in the configuration parameter ``area_units``.
Proportion of cropland represented by each crop
